languages.text:
Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Space Marines' maximum wounds are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered full cover during enemy turns until they die or fall unconscious.

Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Максимальное здоровье{/g} космических десантников увеличивается на показатель их {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g}. Кроме того, их тела считаются полным {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g} во время {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} врага, пока они не погибнут или окажутся {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

languages.text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} von Space Marines werden um ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} erhöht.
Außerdem werden ihre Körper in den {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zügen{/g} von Gegnern behandelt, als hätten sie {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}volle Deckung{/g}, bis sie sterben oder das {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}Bewusstsein verlieren{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Die maximalen Wunden von Space Marines werden um ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} erhöht.
Außerdem werden ihre Körper in den Runden von Gegnern behandelt, als hätten sie volle Deckung, bis sie sterben oder das Bewusstsein verlieren.

Die maximalen Wunden von Space Marines werden um ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} erhöht.
Außerdem werden ihre Körper in den Runden von Gegnern behandelt, als hätten sie volle Deckung, bis sie sterben oder das Bewusstsein verlieren.

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} des Space Marines sont augmentées par leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}.
De plus, jusqu'à ce qu'ils meurent ou {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perdent connaissance{/g}, leurs corps procurent une {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture totale{/g} lors des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g} de l'ennemi
languages.original_text:
Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Les blessures que les Space Marines sont capables d'encaisser sont augmentées par leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}.
De plus, jusqu'à ce qu'ils meurent ou perdent connaissance, leurs corps sont considérés comme des obstacles à part entière lors des tours de l'ennemi.

Les blessures que les Space Marines sont capables d'encaisser sont augmentées par leur {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}.
De plus, jusqu'à ce qu'ils meurent ou perdent connaissance, leurs corps sont considérés comme des obstacles à part entière lors des tours de l'ennemi.

languages.text:
スペースマリーンの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}分増加する。
さらに、敵{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中、死亡するか{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}となるまで、その体は{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}完全遮蔽{/g}とみなされる。
languages.original_text:
Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
スペースマリーンの最大体力が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}分増加する。
さらに、敵ターン中、死亡するか意識不明となるまで、その体は完全遮蔽とみなされる。

スペースマリーンの最大体力が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}分増加する。
さらに、敵ターン中、死亡するか意識不明となるまで、その体は完全遮蔽とみなされる。

languages.text:
Las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} de los Marines Espaciales aumentan en un valor igual a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
Además, sus cuerpos se consideran {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura completa{/g} durante los {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g} enemigos hasta que mueren o caen {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconscientes{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Las heridas máximas de los Marines Espaciales aumentan en un valor igual a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}.
Además, sus cuerpos se consideran cobertura completa durante los turnos enemigos hasta que mueren o caen inconscientes.

languages.text:
星际战士的{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}值提高，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。
此外，在敌方{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，星际战士的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}躯体{/g}会被视为全身掩体，效果持续至星际战士死亡或陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
星际战士的最大生命值提高，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。
此外，在敌方回合时，星际战士的躯体会被视为全身掩体，效果持续至星际战士死亡或陷入昏迷。

星际战士的最大生命值提高，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}。
此外，在敌方回合时，星际战士的躯体会被视为全身掩体，效果持续至星际战士死亡或陷入昏迷。

languages.text:
Uzay Piyadelerinin {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanları {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} nitelikleri kadar artar.
Ayrıca düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turları{/g} esnasında ölene veya {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düşüne dek vücutları {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}tam siperde{/g} kabul edilir.
languages.original_text:
Space Marines' {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Additionally, their bodies are considered {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}full cover{/g} during enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g} until they die or fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.
